Ryan Dahl
Process is global variable.
setTimeout(function(){
console.log("World!");
},2000);
console.log("hello");
your never ever stop in node.
in php echo hello sleep
where as in node cpu goes to zero.
node exit when nothing to do.
node handle concurency well it allow more and more stuff to be done at 
exception server
remove dead socketss form array
debugging edge for node.
